title: Tata Motors to use new $1 bln plant to make Jaguar Land Rover cars
description: Tata Motors intends to manufacture Jaguar Land Rover (JLR) luxury cars at a new $1 billion plant in Tamil Nadu, according to sources familiar with the plans. The company had previously announced its investment in the Tamil Nadu plant without specifying which models would be produced there.
